Name: MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore
About the game: Rip, jump and scrub your way to victory with over 35 tracks in this vastly extended version! Only the Encore edition features the brand new Rhythm Racing mode, extra outdoor Nationals tracks, and exclusive Waypoint races in open world maps. The improved game engine brings remastered HD graphics & sound, smoother online gameplay, and updated riding physics for full control. Features: More than twice as many tracks as the original MX vs. ATV Supercross Rhythm Racing mode: Drag race your friends on straight dirt tracks filled with obstacles and jumps 12 player online mode Free Ride mode for racing without boundaries All new gear and graphics kits Over 60 professional riders to race against More than 80 licensed motocross companies for maximum authenticity Remastered audio which includes for the first time 3D positional sounds and new environmental effects
